strapiPost.title: Crowdfunded Loan Workshop
strapiPost.content:
Are you looking for a way to finance your small business? A crowdfunding organization hub in Rogers is ready to help. 

  • Support: Kiva, which started in Uganda, now has hubs all over the US including one in NWA. The Northwest Arkansas Kiva Hub is dedicated to extending accessibility to capital for area entrepreneurs.
  • Event: Kiva and Startup Junkie are hosting a workshop on Monday Dec. 13 from 6-7p to introduce Kivaâ€™s crowdfunding model for financing small, local businesses. Crowdfunded loans are up to $15K, have 0% interest and require no specific credit score, collateral pledges or U.S. citizenship documentation.

For more information and to register click, HERE.
